timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't be public at all, at the most protected if it's being used in sub mixins.

timeline.bodyText: Yes, this is still necessary. Since the logic is currently looking at the passed in class, we want to be able to ask if the class is either an interface OR an extended class of the base class.
